data.partBlankContent: Dogs do not like it when they are home alone. They a__ very frie____ animals, and th__ want t_ be wi__ people a__ the ti__. Sometimes peo___ leave th__ at ho__ while th__ work, which ma___ dogs s__. Dogs are happiest when they have someone to play with.
data.fullContent: Dogs do not like it when they are home alone. They are very friendly animals, and they want to be with people all the time. Sometimes people leave them at home while they work, which makes dogs sad. Dogs are happiest when they have someone to play with.
data.answer: 狗不喜欢独自在家。它们是非常友好的动物，它们总是想和人类在一起。有时人们把狗留在家里工作，这让狗很伤心。狗狗最开心的时候就是有人陪它们玩的时候。
